title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Vehicle Control System Simulation-Based Practical Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic control theory, vehicle dynamics, programming (Python/Matlab), and foundational communication systems concepts
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design cooperative control strategies among heterogeneous vehicles under DoS attack scenarios.
Learners can achieve target-tracking performance by applying a backstepping control technique using a Barrier Lyapunov function.
Learners can integrate auxiliary system designs and performance constraints to address input saturation issues.
Learners can implement control algorithms that manage model uncertainty and input constraints using Fixed-Time Reinforcement Learning (FT-RL).
Learners can analyze the stability of entire control systems in MATLAB/Simulink-based simulation environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
